name: Scout & Engineer
tag_list: publishing, short-stories, short-fiction, literary-fiction, individualist-fiction, individualistic-fiction, philosophical-fiction, philosophical-short-stories, individualism, egoism
overview:
Scout & Engineer is a print and electronic anthology featuring short fiction that seamlessly integrates philosophy, particularly individualism.

Published here, you’ll find literary, mainstream, and humorous short stories, along with high-quality genre fiction that incorporates Scout & Engineer’s keynote themes. These themes include individualism, individual rights, efficacy of volition, the importance of personal- over crowd-perspective, and freedom from dogma, political freedom.
